remarks: Inverse of a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsuminv as of 6-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsuminvOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsuminvOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsuminvOLD.p $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
gsuminvOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsuminvOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsuminvOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsuminvOLD.n $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsuminvOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
